name: DEAD EYES
description:
Free today with ‘App of the Evening’!

"Don't let the dead eyes find you."

DEAD EYES is a turn-based puzzle game in a grey foggy world being taken over by zombies.

"Heart thumping and thought-evoking turn-based puzzler" -fav. review
"Less of an action thriller and more of a puzzle game" -mashable
"fascinating way to reinvent the zombie cliche." -an indie gamer

In every stage, you will help Jack, a curly-haired boy left alone, survive and reach the destination alive.

Dead Eyes features:

-100+ levels in 4 Episodes
-4 different zombie types with various move patterns
-interactable objects for tricks to slip away from the deadly eyes.
-Full stars in special stages=Collection unlock=hillarious costume mode!!
-Gamecenter Achievements integrated
-Everyplay integrated for sharing/boasting your playvideo!


*The game will need internet connection at the very first launch (5-10 seconds) to download data.
*OS 7.1.2: please update to play the game
